bwwExcerpt: "Guys and Dolls" is one of the great shows in American musical-theater history. Its colorful characters, based on the creations of Damon Runyon; rapturously wonderful songs by Frank Loesser and distinctive comic sensibility fit together with rare perfection.Â Experience tells us, however, that the quality of a show will not be realized in every production.
